# Thrift Illustrated

> Interactive byte-level explorer for Apache Thrift wire format.

## Canonical Sources
- Primary URL: https://thrift.dmytro.sh/
- Repository: https://github.com/kpumuk/thrift-illustrated
- Sitemap: https://thrift.dmytro.sh/sitemap.xml

## What This Site Provides
- Maps raw wire bytes to semantic groups, envelope fields, and payload trees.
- Lets readers inspect each byte span and linked field explanation.
- Uses reproducible JSON artifacts generated from real localhost traffic.

## Supported Protocol + Transport Combinations
- binary + buffered
- binary + framed
- compact + buffered
- compact + framed
- json + buffered
- json + framed
- header + header

## Data Provenance
- Capture data is generated from real Ruby Apache Thrift tutorial client/server traffic on localhost.
- Synthetic wire fixtures are not used.
- Artifacts are committed under `/site/data/captures/`.

## Suggested Citation
Thrift Illustrated. Interactive Apache Thrift byte-level protocol explorer. https://thrift.dmytro.sh/
